Local Government (Amendment of By-laws) Order 2009

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council and on the recommendation of the Minister, make the following order under section 154(1)(b) of the Local Government Act 1993 .

27 April 2009

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

J. G. COX

Minister for Local Government

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Local Government (Amendment of By-laws) Order 2009 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Interpretation
    In this order â€“
        model provision 1A means the model provision set out in Division 1 of Part 1 of Schedule 10 to this order;
        model provision 1B means the model provision set out in Division 2 of Part 1 of Schedule 10 to this order;
        model provision 1C means the model provision set out in Division 3 of Part 1 of Schedule 10 to this order;
        model provision 2A means the model provision set out in Part 2 of Schedule 10 to this order;
        model provision 3A means the model provision set out in Part 3 of Schedule 10 to this order;
        model provision 4 means the model provision set out in Part 4 of Schedule 10 to this order.

4. Brighton Council by-laws amended
    Each by-law made by the Brighton Council specified in column 1 of Part 1 of Schedule 1 to this order is amended as specified adjacent to the by-law in column 2 of that Part.

5. Derwent Valley Council by-laws amended
    Each by-law made by the Derwent Valley Council specified in column 1 of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to this order is amended as specified adjacent to the by-law in column 2 of that Part.

6. Devonport City Council by-laws amended
    Each by-law made by the Devonport City Council specified in column 1 of Part 1 of Schedule 3 to this order is amended as specified adjacent to the by-law in column 2 of that Part.

7. Glenorchy City Council by-laws amended
    Each by-law made by the Glenorchy City Council specified in column 1 of Part 1 of Schedule 4 to this order is amended as specified adjacent to the by-law in column 2 of that Part.

8. Kingborough Council by-laws amended
    Each by-law made by the Kingborough Council specified in column 1 of Part 1 of Schedule 5 to this order is amended as specified adjacent to the by-law in column 2 of that Part.

9. Latrobe Council by-laws amended
    Each by-law made by the Latrobe Council specified in column 1 of Part 1 of Schedule 6 to this order is amended as specified adjacent to the by-law in column 2 of that Part.

10. Northern Midlands Council by-laws amended
    Each by-law made by the Northern Midlands Council specified in column 1 of Part 1 of Schedule 7 to this order is amended as specified adjacent to the by-law in column 2 of that Part.

11. Waratah-Wynyard Council by-laws amended
    Each by-law made by the Waratah-Wynyard Council specified in column 1 of Part 1 of Schedule 8 to this order is amended as specified adjacent to the by-law in column 2 of that Part.

12. West Coast Council by-laws amended
    Each by-law made by the West Coast Council specified in column 1 of Part 1 of Schedule 9 to this order is amended as specified adjacent to the by-law in column 2 of that Part.

PART 2 - CLAUSE FOR CAR PARKING BY-LAW

    15. Prescribed penalties for parking offences under the Local Government (Highways) Act 1982
        For the purposes of section 100(4) of the Local Government (Highways) Act 1982 , the prescribed penalty for an infringement notice issued for an offence under section 97, 98 or 99 of that Act is the applicable sum specified in the following table:
